favourite.article: This song is so lovely! It simply encourages us brothers and sisters to go on, continue pursuing the Lord Jesus. Aspiring us to become the mighty ones of the Lord! Four words: Oh Lord, Amen, Hallelujah!
AMEN. Thank You Lord. Such a nice song.

The hymns have the flavor of the Lord, they are very encouraging to continue running the race toward the Lord in His Kingdom, the crown of righteousness. I love the Lord, and I thank that to the Lord's recovery, the local churches. It is lovely to live in His Body.
